member.name: MFASYNC_WORKQUEUE_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of work queue for the function to create.

member.name: MFASYNC_WORKQUEUE_TYPE.MF_STANDARD_WORKQUEUE
member.summary: Create a work queue without a message loop.

member.name: MFASYNC_WORKQUEUE_TYPE.MF_WINDOW_WORKQUEUE
member.summary: Create a work queue with a message loop.

member.name: MFASYNC_WORKQUEUE_TYPE.MF_MULTITHREADED_WORKQUEUE
member.summary: Create a multithreaded work queue. This type of work queue uses a thread pool to dispatch work items. The caller is responsible for serializing the work items.
